front.div:
PRELIMINARY 2
Features Single-chip, easy-to-integrate, low cost
flash disk
Simple, easy-to-integrate interface
Low power, single 3.3V power supply
16MByte (128 Mbit) capacity
State of the art 0.22 flash technology
Small form factor − standard 48-pin
TSOP-I package
Pinout compatible with future TSOP-I
DiskOnChip products
High reliability: EDC/ECC on the fly
Full boot capability with auto-loading
boot-block – can be the only non-
volatile device in the system!
(e.g. replace the BIOS chip)
Static operation — no clock required
Supports 3.3V Host I/F
(I/F is 5V tolerant)
Memory window size: 8KB
Embedded TrueFFS
® software
provides:
— Full hard disk read/write emulation
— Third-generation wear leveling
— Automatic block management
Operates with DiskOnChip-OSAK in
O/S-less environments, ANSI-C source
code kit
Broad O/S support: DOS, Windows 3.X,
Windows 95, Windows NT4.0/5.
0,
Windows CE; Additional support
offered: pSOS+, QNX, VxWorks, BE
and others
Compatible with major processors: x86,
MediaGX, PowerPC, 68K, MIPS, SHx,
StrongARM, and others.
March 2001
